Content: I have worked with Chandra on various projects throughout our studies at Humber College. Chandra has proven to be a hard-working, conscientious and fantastic team player. He has a contagious personality; his enthusiasm, positive attitude, and best of all, his great sense of humour, has made it a pleasure to work with him. I strongly believe that Chandra would be a great asset to any company.

Raja is the one among the few dedicated and hard working individual I have ever seen. He had always been a "go-to" man for any task that has to be completed in time without compromising on quality. I am sure he would bring lot of wealth in technical aspect . Any employer wish to have person like him working for them.

I worked with CSP for 2+ yrs in NMS works software for different product versions and projects. While considering the work, I feel CSP is a man symbol for hard work and all the works he does, he will keep certain levels of standard. There will be efficiency in his all works and he finishes his works on time. He is fully committed on his professional life and he will go beyond the limits when the company needs him to, in case of some R&D works in web applications. If he decides to achieve some targets, nobody can stop him and he will never afraid to take risk to reach what he wants. He is very clear about his short term,long term goals in his professional and his accomplishments in his carriers. He keeps abreast of updated technologies and he does R&D always before applying new technologies. Over all, he is very nice person to move with and I recommend him for any organization who seeks a web developer expert as senior level. I wish him All the very best for his bright future Regards, Hariharan

I worked with raja during NMSWorks days. He is always ready to stretch his capabilities in delivering the customer commitments. He showed great interest in learning concepts. He is defiantly a great assert to the organization.

I recruited Raja while i was with NMSWorks, he is cool chap, very much fun loving, very much committed & hardworking. I have no hesitations in saying that he would be an asset to any organization where he chooses to work. I am sure that he will come out with excellent solutions for the assigned assignment. I wish him success in all his future endeavors. - M.G.K.Monian

“I have known Sakthivel for the last one year, and my association with him goes beyond just colleagues. I have been consistently impressed by both his attitude and approach towards work was good at all times ..

Sakthi stood out as the best recruit amongst the fresher lot during 2007. From a promising fresher, he is placing himself as a specialist who can provide quality solutions to the challenging requirements. He is a self motivator who has a lot of energy and unyielding focus to get things swiftly done. He will be a good find for any organization.

Sakthi is very proactive, likes to learn a lot of new stuff and hard working. He inspires people around him to have lot of technical discussions. He has a very good in depth knowledge of Java concepts, concurrency being his fort.

I worked with sakthivel for 1 year in Tejas networks. He keeps our environment very fun and joy. He is very good in TMF, SDH, SONET, Java and good in analytical skills. He solved most of the issues which we faced. he has very good programming skill. He took more responsibility and challenges in his assignments.

Hari is someone who is technically very strong, and knows how to apply those skills to solve real world problems. Quick witted, and an amazing sense of humor, there never is a dull moment with Hari around.

working with Hariharan is really great ,very humble ,helping and very helpful person in my team,new concepts which he has in his mind and helps when ever he has time when others are not finding out the solutions,It was really an good opportunity with working with you mate !! wish you all the best for your future endeavours !!

Hari studied with me and afterwards also i know him since he worked few months in mumbai when i was working in mumbai and we are good friends still. He is a hard worker. Has done certification in CCNA. Ready to travel, I know it because in his earlier career he has worked in mumbai, chennai and other few cities, has very good adjusting nature. Not work at desk kind of person, moves around and work at on the site.

Hari is best hardworker, We are lucky to have hari as our collegue at A&T, who has gone for many tours accross India for his carrier. He reduces our work preasure by making fun. Basically he has more humerous sense. I have never met such humerous person after him. God Bless You.

Hariharan is a committed NMS professional who does his work with all importance and leaves no stone unturned until he completes that. He has an proficient knowledge in the NMS domain and its features.

A hardworking, and a very hands on technical guy with lot of patience, diligence and attention to detail. His knowledge of NMS, OSS domain and his grasp of TMF, and other telecom standards are commendable. An unassuming, and easily approachable team member who will be an asset to any team.
Ravi has a sound knowledge about Telecom and an excellent Leader. He always updates himself with new technologies also helps his peers in tough situations
I worked with Ravinder in Netact mediation LTE project. He is having very good debugging skills. He is approachable.

MGK was reporting to me for building teams in India and UK, for new and ongoing projects in US and UK. MGK was a indispensable resource for me and my "go to" guy for any issues related to resourcing. He was always approachable and was excellent in employee relations. He will be an assent to any company & add value to the HR department. I wish him all success in all his future endeavors.

MGK is professional, organised and has a natural aptitude for giving advice and guidance to managers of every level on all HR matters. I have worked with a number of HR professionals over the years and MGK is amongst the best, and I can see a real future for him at the top of the HR profession in a senior HR Management role. MGK has a genuine enthusiasm for HR work and I have been encouraged by the fact that he is keen to learn and develop others through his own work. A valuable professional in HR and a real pleasure to work with.

I was working with MGK for almost two years in a transactional period when Velti got listed in Nasdaq and the HR department’s complexity and expectations were very demanding. MGK was a very respectful colleague, an HR Manager that was handling all three growing Velti offices in Mumbai, Chennai and New Delhi, with stunning managerial, project management and social skills and an amazing way of getting things done on time and within strict deadlines. I would recommend MGK for any multitasking HR Management role in a multinational company that needs to engage the employees and I always look forward to work with him again!

Monian is highly organized, detail oriented HR professional, and he always has a smiling face and willing to go that extra mile to help people. He truly knows how to bring out the best in an individual and fully supported the actions and gave complete freedom to work on the initiatives the way we want to. Has a very good understanding of issues and also provides solutions to any problems. His pleasing personality makes him a good team fit for any team. As an HR professional he established good bonding with his colleagues and created a good spirit of team work. I wish him success in all his endeavours.

Monian is the most skilled HR professional, I have had the pleasure to work with. The quality of his work is exceptional and he always is in service to the teams he supports. His broad experience makes him a unique addition to any team and his dynamic personality makes him a pleasure. I wish him all the best for the future . And would definitely like to work with him again and recommend him highly

MGK is a true HR and people's person. He understands the need of the employees'. He is able to convey the management's perspective while keeping in mind with the employees' pulse. He is very clued-on to the organisation's goals and ensures contribution towards the same. Both, personally and professionally... MGK is great. He is a unique mix of being amiable and professional at the same time.

I interviewed & selected Monian for the position of Manager HR at Velti, he is approachable & very strong in employee relation. He has closed good numbers in terms of recruitment within a short span of time. He a all-rounder in HR & passionate in what he does. I am confident that he will be an asset to any company & add value to the HR department. I wish him all the very best.

MGK is excellent in resource hiring,. His team handling, motivating, training skills are extra ordinary. He handles the HR activities in a more balanced manner. I recommend him and wish him all success.

MGK was our HR Manager for our India Division, which had 4 offices and roughly 150 employees. MGK supported my team which was Global Recruitment. MGK was very thorough and an valuable asset to the success of my team and our efforts in building a world class organization in the region. He is a diligent worker who I could find available all all hours of the day and night. I highly recommend MGK to anyone and am open to discuss MGK with anyone.. Chris Carlucci Global Director, Corporate Recruitment

MGK is characterized by his team spirit and great collaborations with colleagues. Even if the other group members are based in other countries, he hasthe ability to make them feel a team with common goals. He is always friendly and willing to help anytime needed.

Monian is an selfless HR professional that seeks to balance the needs of those he supports with the needs of the business. He is professional yet personable and approachable. I would welcome the opportunity to work with Monian again!

Monian is Very much sutiable for People & Culture. He is such a nice personal had goog relationship with all employees. Very much talented in Recruitment. I was with him during campus recruitment. He proved that he is always different from others. Good communication and voice modulation which pull audience
Monian is one of best choices in any HR Dept. He is a man of dedication,time bound, innovation,initiator etc..,having and maintaining good relationship between his Dept and Technical People.

Monian is a dedicated hard worker who is always ready to take initiatives. He is enthusiastic and filled with energy. He readily accept challenges and put his best efforts in delivering results. He is a good listener with great networking skills. Once he gets in any project, he makes sure it is accomplished with full accuracy. I wish him all the very best for his future endeavors!

Monion is one of the most talented HR managers I have met yet. He does understand his responsibility as a HR manager and he exceeds expectations in most of the HR functions. He is very detail oriented and makes sure each and every process is fulfilled diligently. I have seen him working with many employees and helping them resolving HR related issues. His recruiting skills are commendable and he knows how to grab the right talent for the organization. He has great negotiation skills. I strongly recommend him for HR leadership roles. I am sure he will be an asset to any organization, he will work with.

MGK Monian was my student and associate in my psychological service at Santosh Hospitals. He did his MS Counselling & Psychotherapy from IPMS Mumbai. as a student he impressed me as a most diligent and sincere student keen in learning the intricacies of Psychology its use as a therapy.He is very sincere as my associate. Prof G Rajamohan Ph D dean of Studies IPMS Mumbai

Monian is fantastic and a genuine HR talent that i have seen in recent times..He is hard working and very good at administration too... His communication skills and fantastic attitude separates him from others in the HR industry... he is very crisp and clear in his communication and has tremendous ability to manage talents... and also gels well with people at all times... His self confidence and his go getter attitude will take him places.... I wish him Super Success for his future endeavors and good luck too... He will really play a pivotal role in any company he works... Cheers !
MGK is a charming friend who has the helping tendency. He is working in a Level 5 high level unit as a manager shares req to us

* I have never ever seen such a good HR in my carrier * He understands the employees inch by inch and move with them accordingly * Nobody can easily blame on his work, that much professionalism in work * He will be a brand ambassador for the company wherever he works because when ever a new employee joins,the HR is the first person to identify the quality of that company I hope he does it up to that mark * I am glad to say that I got an opportunity to with Monian at NMS Works I wish him All the very best for his bright Future! Regards, Hariharan

Monian, i worked with him for around 3 years in NMSWorks. He is very friendly, helpful. Round the clock he will be very energetic. He has the ability to find good solutions instantly for any problems. Though we both are out of NMS now, recently when i had a bad phase in my career, monian is the one of few, who helped me to come out of that problem. He is a born HR.

He is the first person who I met in NMS Works. He is the man who is capable of reaching one step ahead whether in the recruitment process or corporate-guidance and corportate-ethics. I have learned many things from Monian about ethics, how to involve better in the team and corporate approach when you are dealing with other colleagues. His casual approach and polite talks in a positive way make everybody feel charged-in when some body is stressed up with corporate pressure. Monian always treat every colleague as speical and his guidance for the new joinees is worthwhile. I recommend Monian to any organization who looks for a better experienced HR Manager and who thinks ethics is important for the corporate world.

A high profiler, strong decision making skills and tactical in implementing innovative strategies and ideas. A perfect bridge between the employees and the management. He has a proven record of recruiting the right candidates for right positions. Overall, it was a wonderful learning experience working with Monian and I wish him good luck on his current and future endeavors.
An excellent team worker with unmatched zeal , enthusiasm & passion. A perfect corporate material person & an great individual

MGK is known to be for more than 3 years now. He is a hard worker. An assignment given to him will be finished at any cost. He is an all rounder in HR. I had been amazed about him getting right candidates as well managing an outing plus understanding every human in the organization in attitude and nature of delivery of work. I used to depend on him for inside infos. Given the right nuturing he will excel.

MR. Monian is a excellent speaker and very good at HR management. His working attitude is truly professional and a quick responsive person. His abilities to handle work pressure very silently is remarkable. Priya
The environment at NMSWorks changed once Monian joined the HR team. I reported and co-ordinated with him for personal and non-technical issues. He is a very friendly person.

MGK has it in him what it takes, as an HR manager, to keep the employees in a growing startup company focused towards the organization's goal. A great team player, whom any associate, without any hesitation, looks upto at his/her moment of need. Does a great balancing act between the Management and the work force, keeping each party satisfied. It was a great experience working with him at NMSWorks.

I had the pleasure of knowing Moni from USMC, he was with us from the beginning of the company till its end. He started his career as an Business Development person then turned out to be one of the best recruiter and then spruced up himself to be a distinguished HR. He is a people's person and has strong leadership qualities, adorable and very much compassionate about the things he does. My final words about him is that he is veracious & allegiant. I wish him all success in life.

I was always at ease with Monian during my days at NMSWorks. He is very practical in his approach towards the demands of his job and was always available to sit and discuss freely on any need. He comes up with solutions for each of the requirements and is also very open to suggestions. It is these qualities that have ensured that I am in regular touch with him even after moving out of NMSWorks.

I shared a truly wonderful working relationship with Monian, built on complete trust between each other. I see Monian as more than a Human Resource Manager - he is a versatile performer capable of taking on multiple roles within the HR domain - be it as a recruiter, training facilitator, employee retention and growth evangelist, and most important of all, as career counsellor who could turn the most pessimistic individual into a die-hard optimist ! My continuing relationship with Monian is a proof of my high regards for Monian. I wish him all the best.

“Monian is one of the assets to my company. He is cheerful, loyal and helping too. Monian is committed towards his work and is an enthusiastic employee. Likes to accept challenges in the jobs he takes and meets the deadlines.”
Mr. Monian has potential in HR Management, I can say he is very hardwork and sincere guy, and also have good people management skill.

MGK Monian is a pleasant person to work with. He is meticulous in his work and aware and sensitive of various requirements of his position and plans in advance and see that the assignments given to be executed as per the targets and results expected. Out of office as well he is pleasant person and has empathy and helping tendency which earns him a lot friends

Monian is the HR Manager of the company, where I am working now. He is a hardworking, dedicated person. He is a perfect examble of how an HR Manager should be. Monian is so friendly with all the employees and is ready to provide a solution regardless its personal or official problem. He is a perfectionsit in dealing with both the senior management and the employees, and getting things sorted out. I wish him all the best in his career.

We have worked with Sam and his team over the past year to actualise two products out of our suite, and have found the process highly fulfilling. It is with great sincerity that I recommend Sam, who delivers on requirements and goes over and above to ensure client satisfaction.

I feel confident in recommending Samir who is one of the best friends of me. I know him since school days when he helped me to know 'what is a computer' with lots of practical experiments on newly bought computer at home, "Thank you Samir.." Moreover, his ideas are always creative and he keeps moving ahead to grasp knowledge on new technologies. I feel very proud of his own founded 'Samcom Technobrains' which provides software services to its clients all around the world. He has achieved this with his correct attitude and dedication towards work. He has real leadership skills and is very supportive and capable person. I wish him all the best for his future endeavors...

Sam is the total package- honest, reliable, knowledgeable, and talented. Sam did a great job of taking a concepts that had run into some very large problems and re-create it as a full functioning tool for my company to grow it's business. Sam will be an asset to any project and will quickly become a friend to you and your business.

To me, the first image associated with Sameer is of a person with extensive knowledge in computer technology and safety. His presence always filled the environment with ideas of innovation, change and new developments in information technology. When managing any project, he is a problem solver leading the team in the right direction. Time pressure and deadlines have always seemed to be only of relative impact to Sameer’s positive attitude addressed in the most organised way. He is undoubtedly one of the most humble person, everybody will always stay in touch with.

Binoy is a fantastic person and feeling confident about recommending Binoy. I worked with binoy and his skills really impressed me. he understands well and execute it in a better way of anyone can do it. I was amazed when binoy worked on ASP.NET, Android, iPhone, Smart TV on his starting which is outstanding performance by him. Moreover, his ideas are always creative and he keeps moving ahead to grasp knowledge on new technologies. He always deserve better and I hope he will get that. I wish him all the best for his future endeavors..

Ketan is a perfect package of honesty, perfection, intelligence, knowledge and list goes on. when I met ketan first time, I realized what makes difference in our life and what is the importance of education. I admit here that if ketan had not met with me, I would have been nothing…ketan is dedicated to his work whatever he do…and extremely intelligent. I know only him who can solve artificial intelligence puzzle in a min..which is awesome. I always wish him the best life because I knew he is the best in his career.
Puneet is very enthusiastic person as I know him from my college days, as a good friend and good student, he is a nice person.

I got my final semester training under Mr Nikhil Patel and that was the time I met him. He is very intelligent and detail oriented. He is always focus for his next goal and very dedicated for his work. His guidance and advice are priceless for me and under his excellence I learnt those lessons which are not taught in schools or colleges. He is fun loving man with a great sense of humor. Overall he is a nice person and I enjoyed to work with him.

Today I am feeling so proud by giving my recommendation to one of my great friend and a dashing brother Saaurabh Singh JI. He is a dynamic businessman with high moral values.He is a Man with strong determination, hardwork and will-power. I am proud to have a wise mate like him in my professional connection.I am having a tremendous trust on him and I always pray for his bright future.Regards #kamaldeepsingh #mylovelylinkie family
Saurabh is a powerhouse resource in building and inculcating great stuff to realisation and practicality with candid results achievement ! Kudos

Few people get chance to work with great leader like Saurabh, Saurabh was the CEO when I worked at AppStudioz. During his tenure the AppStudioz's growth graph was exponential and same curve follows for every individual. He is a great leader who motivates every individual in company to do something creative and extra to make them different from the crowd. He is also a great adviser and always have handful of best opinions on the idea you share with him. He can be a catalyst for any business to reach new heights.

I’ve had the privilege of working with Saurabh for around 2 years and in that time I have known him to be a well-grounded and down to earth boss and colleague. Saurabh is a dedicated, ambitious, result driven leader and thoughtful individual. He is great in dealing with difficult situations and a fantastic problem solver. His creative thinking, expertise, positive can-do attitude make him an absolute pleasure to work with. He is enthusiastic, personable and a brilliant networker. His strengths in staying across issues, pro-actively offering solutions and ideas and being adapt at all aspects of communications make him a valuable contributor to any situation or team. He has built a strong (and deserved) reputation as someone with vision, diligence and honor – someone who gets things done. It was always a very nice experience working with him and under his guidance.

Mr Singh has been an excellent find for my business, he bares an enormous skill in understanding assorted mobile platforms and the different obstacles which come in the way when developing an application with multiple compatibly. I feel very lucky to have found an honest and knowledgeable company and person like Saurabh to deal with and highly recommend them for your mobile application queries, developments and upgrades. Their portfolio is very extensive and makes explaining and communicating a breeze based on their past precedent experience dealing with all situations. Look forward to working together again soon in the future!

Saurabh is a wonderful leader and a visionary. AwakIND is his most aspiring and humble initiatives. It’s very interesting to see a Technology entrepreneur to take such initiative for a social cause. Portals like AwakIND will transform the way politics work in India with the educated class of people also actively participating in the national concerns. My best wishes for AwakIND.

I know Saurabh for a long time now. He is a man of substance,great visionary,creative, innovative and high energy leader of the current time. His hard work has resulted in many positive outcomes. A True networker(open-stragtegic). I wish him luck in the future.

Well, to write a few lines for Saurabh would be a selfish move. To write a lot about him would be "being over generous". Jokes apart. I could never have the exact word frame to write about this guy. He’s full of energy, enthusiasm, idea’s and is very active most of the times. The few times I worked with him, I found him extremely charged up and always looking for new ventures. I am sure he’s going to go a long way in his career. I wish him all the best for all his future endeavors
Great to be part of Saurabh's trusted network! A consummate professional and a reliable connection. Highly recommend to all others. Thank you, and good luck!

I have found working with Saurabh to be a complete pleasure. His company has done a couple of iPhone apps for our company. We shopped other vendors prior to awarding a contract to his company XEN GlobalTech. We were consistently and pleasantly surprised by our experience with this company. His employees were consistently helpful and quick in responding to concerns or challenges. I highly recommend working with this company. We will continue to seek bids from other companies on our future projects but we will also be pulling for XEN GlobalTech to win each contract for future development because of their excellent customer service.

Saurabh is a very focused and determined individual and can handle loads of things simultaneously.He is both a good leader and colleague. His work ethics are attributed to his integrity to succeed. He is a valuable asset to any organization, specifically in a leadership capacity with great responsibility.

From the onset, Saurabh had some tremendous entrepreneurial capability and he always harnessed his energy towards the right direction. Perseverence, commitment and dedication were his few skills which led to his success in BrickRed and I am sure as he has some good relationship building skills he will go a long way.
Saurabh is a very good person to work with and has world class capabilities as well as accelerate engineering benefits.

Generated a lot of internal thinking; refreshingly honest, his company XEN consistently displays a superior level of expertise, forethought, attention to details and ability to think strategically... We couldn't be more pleased.

Saurabh has tremendous energy and zeal to do something extraordinary. His friendly and supportive nature are enough to catch people's attention towards him and are really a big plus to his personality. I wish him all the very best for his new venture.

Saurabh's visionary talent is one of the finest I ever witnessed in my yet experience of IT business. He is a born leader full of energy and ideas, a good manager and leader, and a person of high integrity. Saurabh is always aware of his team's activities and keep on motivating them, he trust each one of his direct reports to give him the very best of service. And because of that trust, because of his vision, each of Teams is always ready to write a new Success Story and add a new mile stone in XEN InfoTech journey in the insurance and technology industry. He never dawned on us that we would fail! Saurabh gave us the sense that we were awesome professionals and that we could make anything happen with the right steps. My tenure working with Saurabh will continue as it is one of my fondest IT working experience. I consider Saurabh a dear friend and trusted confidant and more over as my elder Brother and want to be always a part of his learning. He has keen understanding of business and is committed for giving the best IT solution to his Clients. All the Best XEN.... and We are committed for XEN InfoTech growth and prosperity.. Shubhankar Rahul

Saurabh is a smart professional with in-depth knowledge of Sales, Marketing and brand building. I found him to have high energy, a great sense of self, and very result oriented person. He is very enthusiastic and target driven personality with a smart work attitude. He is bright, inquisitive, productive, and aggressive at finding better ways to do things.
Saurabh is a very intelligent, capable and hard working individual. He has a strong background in Marketing IT Services and a proven record in getting the job done.

Saurabh is a well organized manager with excellent organizational and management skills, He is very a creative and focused leader. He always take his task as a mission and he put his 100% to achieve it.He has good know-how of his domain and has huge professional circle in industry.He also does an amazing job bringing them all together.Overall he is a productive and result oriented guy.
Saurabh brings to table over 5 years of experience in driving Business Development and Strategy in IT Service Industry with lot of new innovative ideas.

Saurabh has the ambition to grow!!He would not leave any stones unturned to get work done...He is focussed and worthy for making a mark at all avenues of life..I wish him all the very best for his future...

Was one of the best experiences I’ve had with a recruiter. He was honest and upfront, made you feel as if he was on your side just as much as his company’s. Sid has also produced really great candidates when I was on the interviewer side. He really strives to understand the role and requirements to produce high end prospects.
Sid has strong candidate sourcing skills and a keen eye for the unorthodox but invariably perfect candidate to the meet his clients' needs. He's an excellent asset to my team building efforts.

Sid is a pleasure to work with, he recently approached me about a new opportunity. The process was very professional and Sid walk me through the opportunity and process. Thanks to Sid I’m working in a great new role.

SID is full of positivity...it literally took 50 days from the client side to onboard me after the interview/offer on my current role due to budgetary issues and Christmas vacations etc... SID walked me through it with patience, met with me in person and made me stay positive about the role until I finally started on my new DevOps position a week ago.

Sid has helped me place in a big organization. He is a very professional and intelligent person. He is very passionate about his work and takes the time to really listen. Another good thing about him is that he follows up after placement. I wish him all the best in life!
Sid played a key role in placing me in RBC. In fact, this role has been open for cople of months. I like the way he approach and submit profile to right opening at right time. Keep up uour good work!

Sid a récemment travaillé à me trouver un emploi dans mon domaine. Il a été efficace et très disponible. Vous serez entre bonnes main si vous lui accorder votre confiance. J'ai été bien servi. Serge bureau

I am pleased to recommend/endorse for SID who worked with me for a job position as a Sr. PHP/WordPress developer with Rogers. SID is well organized technical recruiter and always kept me informed of the latest status updates of my next job position. He was able to negotiate well between my new role and myself as he transitioned the process smoothly to land me in Rogers. He always communicated well with me throughout the process as we collaboratively worked together to find a win-win solution that was beneficial for both parties involved. I believe that SID would be an excellent addition to any company.

Sid has been instrumental and proactive in helping me land a position at a large company. He is always polite and exceptionally eager to help. He also cares very much to follow up and see how things are going. It is great to work with him.

Provider_Name: Robert Choi, PMP CSM ITIL TOGAF
Content: Sid is a phenomenal recruiter. He is very passionate about recruitment. Highly proactive and assists candidates in whole hiring process. I highly recommend his service if you are looking for a career transition.

SID is one of the most competent recruiters I have had the pleasure to work with. He represents both the potential candidate as well as the company very well. SID will add great value to any team and he is very dependable/available for his candidates & clients at any given time. He is one of those top notch recruiters that you don't see every day, I personally recommend SID to any organization that appreciates a creative, aggressive, high energy approach to delivering results.

Provider_Name: Usama K.Lodhi - PMP, ITIL, OCP , CSM
Content: It was a pleasure to work with SID who facilitated my appointment to my latest role. SID is a professional service provider who was responsive and who took the time to understand the role I was after. Plus he is always available for you even after appointment if you have any questions or concerns. he is very friendly and professional. I wish him best of luck.

Sid is a very professional recruiter who helped me throughout the entire process of my new job. First he suggested a few changes to help edit my resume, and after applying for the job he arranged my interviews with the company according to my schedule. He also communicated with me on a daily basis to get my application through smoothly. Then he walked me through the process of what i needed in order to get everything submitted on time and correctly so that there was no delay. There were some documents which i could not send over because i did not have a scanner at the time and he made other arrangements for me so that i can send him directly and he would then scan and forward my documents for me. He was very helpful with each detail and had been prompt on every step. I would recommend him to anyone looking for a smooth process in applying for a job. Thank-you Sid!

I worked with Jonathan at Avenlo and found him to be knowledgeable, hard working and possessed with great perseverance. He has ambition and works hard to better himself. A great person to work with. Derek Bowers Senior DBA Avenlo

Sarah is thoughtful, passionate, and truly tries to understand both her candidates and client's to deliver a service built on trust and delivery. in just a few short weeks she got up to speed on our complex ATS, and asks the right questions. Shes doesn't give up easily and sets the bar high in terms of her expectations from herself and those she works with. We are excited to have her on our talent acquisition team :)

I had the pleasure of working with and managing Sarah for the last year at Magic Leap. She joined my team to help scale our software organization globally. This group is extremely dynamic and demanding. Sarah hit the ground running and quickly built solid relationships with hiring managers and key members of the teams she supported. She immediately made progress on some of our toughest teams to recruit for such as Computer Vision, Software Performance & Reliability, and Embedded Software. Sarah's a team player and would take on new teams without question. She's a strong communicator and is adept at building relationships with candidates and internal stakeholders. I loved that she would really hone in on what her teams were working on and even took the initiative to learn programming languages to better connect with her teams and candidates. Sarah is a talented and hard working technical recruiter. Sarah was assigned to my larger team last year to help fill multiple roles out of which 2 were on my team. She came to us having worked with a different technology set. She setup a time with me to go over what was a requirement and what was nice to have and then sat in the first few interviews to get an even better understanding of what I was looking for. After that, she added technical questions to her screen which helped weed out some of the candidates. Sarah screened resumes and forwarded candidates that looked like good fits, went through LinkedIn profiles with me to look for candidates when we felt that the resumes we were receiving were not strong enough. Finally, when we did decide on the first hire, we unfortunately ended up in a temporary hiring freeze, but that didn't deter her. She stayed in touch with the potential hire through out the time and brought them on-board as soon as freeze ended. She was instrumental in bringing both eventual hires on-board. And the end of all of it, she was poached by a different team. Sarah is smart, tenacious and is not afraid to challenge herself to learn new technologies to be effective in her role. She is a gem and will add immediate value to any org.

Sarah is an amazing and passionate technical recruiter. she is determined to get the best talent no matter how hard and to do it promptly and efficiently. She has a great and approachable personality and leaves no stone unturned to achieve her goals. It was great working with you and thanks for your contribution to establish the extraordinarily talented perception team at magic leap.

Working with Sarah proved to be a fantastic experience. She has a genuine desire to relate with candidates on a personal and professional level. Her ability to be both efficient and highly communicative is top notch. Sarah found about 100+ candidates, some of them was successfully hired. That was non-trivial task because we are looking for high-end profile developers with very specific skills and experiences required for analysis of Spatial computing problems. I highly recommend her to any future employer or candidate. Please contact with me should you require any further information. Yours Faithfully, Leonid Moiseichuk PhD in Computer Science

Sarah and I worked together at Magic Leap supporting the entire software org. Any recruiting team would be lucky to have her and any hiring manager should be thrilled to work with her.
